detail.description:
USSC Super Service allows you to access your Panalo Wallet with your phone. You can now easily manage your funds with just a tap on a button. No more waiting in line! The Super Service App is made accessible with free data, no need to buy data access to make USSC transactions. Easily sign up for an account today!

Manage Your Money

- Easily send money to your loved ones with Super Padala and Western Union

- Receive money on your mobile app also through Super Padala and Western Union

- Instantly convert your US Dollars to Philippine Peso with the online money changer

- Build up your personal savings in your Panalo Wallet

- Transfer funds to you Cash Card for instant use and access

Bills Payment
-Easily pay for your utility, cellphone and credit card bills

Eloading
-Load up to call, surf, text, play and watch your favorite shows and movies

Budget Insurance
-LifeGuard is your affordable accident insurance

Branch Locator
-Easily find the your nearest USSC branch


Go to your nearest USSC Super Service Store to activate your account for FREE!

Check out www.ussc.com.ph and https://facebook.com/ussc.philippines for more details.


        more
